desc.tprequest.trtpa: /%s <Player> : Send a request to teleport to the location of the target player.
desc.tprequest.trtpahere: /%s <Player> : Send a request, asking the target player to teleport to your location.
desc.tprequest.trtpaccept: /%s : Accept the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpcancel: /%s : Cancel the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpdeny: /%s : Deny the pending request. If more than one, list them.
desc.tprequest.trtpignore: /%s : Ignore the pending request. If more than one, list them.
msg.tprequest.not_present: Cannot get request sender or receiver...
msg.tprequest.reload.failure: Failed to reload Teleportation Request configuration! Please check the configuration file.
msg.tprequest.sent: Teleportation request sent! Expiration Time: %d tick(s)
